div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1628 Jerusalem (Mount Scopus), Judaea, 1944 Burial: after 29 B.C. Contents: 11 AR Demetrius II: 2 tetradr. (Tyre 142/1 B.C., 130/29) Tyre: 9 tetradr. (42/1-30/29 B.C.) Disposition: Jerusalem (Hebrew Univ.) Sukenik, Dinaburg Anniversary Volume (Jerusa- lem, 1949), pp. 102-3
